titleStmt.title: Antinomianisme anatomized. Or, A glasse for the lawlesse: who deny the ruling use of the morall law unto Christians under the gospel. / By John Sedgwick, B.D. and Pastor of the Church of God at Alphag, neer Cripple-gate London.
titleStmt.author: Sedgwick, John, 1600 or 1601-1643.

titleStmt.title: Antinomianisme anatomized. Or, A glasse for the lawlesse: who deny the ruling use of the morall law unto Christians under the gospel. / By John Sedgwick, B.D. and Pastor of the Church of God at Alphag, neer Cripple-gate London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Samuel Gellibrand, and are to be sold at his Shop in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Brazen Serpent,
